channel.title: Eluminous
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/x2othx.png[/img]
[center][font=impact][size=50pt]THE DEVELOPMENT TEAM[/size][/font][/center] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mS8Ei.png[/img][color=red]Morgan Freeman[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mS8Ei.png[/img][color=red]-Open-[/COLOR] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mS8Ei.png[/img][color=red]-Open-[/COLOR]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vrzmM.gif[/img][color=black][I]Gfx artist - Open[/I][/COLOR]
[center][font=impact][size=50pt]ANALYSIS[/size][/font][/center]
[color=darkcyan][B][I]Eluminous[/I] Is going to be my greatest project yet. I am going to be making this server pking. Even though it is PI and there are bugs everyone already knows bugs can be fixed and things can be improved[I] Old and new Runescape will be combined in one game. [/I] [I]I am going to make this an experience of a lifetime and host this server as long as i can. Me and my soon to be partner will be discussing multiple things we are adding from this server but we wont be able to do this alone. We are going to need your support as well and we are going to need some good ideas to help us make this server what i am hopping it can become. If u want to support this project please take the provided image below and stick it in your signature to show you want Eluminous to go big![/I].[/B]
[center][font=impact][size=50pt]Client Media[/size][/font][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/1-17.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/2-15.png[/img][/center]
[center][font=impact][size=50pt]Server Media[/size][/font][/center]
[center] [IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/3-15.png[/img][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/4-13.png[/img][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/5-8.png[/img][IMG]http://i1125.photobucket.com/albums/l594/stnbarton12/6-7.png[/img][/CENTER]
[center][font=impact][size=50pt]FEATURES[/size][/font][/center]
[center][*]Hyperion Game Engine [*]634 Items [*]New Hitmarkers [*]New Text Engine [*]Nice Loading Bar [*]Nice Loginscreen [*]602 Animations [*]602 Npcs[/center]
[code]How old are you?: You currently need msn or skype (username?) What position do you want? (Server Programmer, Gfx Artist, Tester): On a scale of 1-10 how familiar are you at programing PI? What time zone are you in?: How many hours a week can you be active?: Why do you want to become part of this server?: Any Suggestions?:[/code]

item.title: Eluminous
item.dc:creator: @kronixz kronikz
item.description:
@kronixz wrote:

tyb97:

Only issue I see is the implementation of the Hyperion game engine.

that is what vistex did to improve amount of players.
this is a defenite leach of vistex. This server can only hold about 40 players.

leeched.

Read full topic

item.title: Eluminous
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote author=tyb97 link=topic=562222.msg4103513#msg4103513 date=1347753136]
Only issue I see is the implementation of the Hyperion game engine.
[/quote
I was ginna pick up in that but didn’t want to start a huge massive war again.

Inb4 hyperion engine is only for hyperion and not to be set into any other frameworks.

Read full topic

item.description:
@Mystic-Effect wrote:

[CENTER]

[center][font=impact][size=50pt]THE DEVELOPMENT TEAM[/size][/font][/center]
[color=red]Morgan Freeman[/COLOR]
[color=red]-Open-[/COLOR]
[color=red]-Open-[/COLOR]

[color=black]Gfx artist - Open[/COLOR]

[center][font=impact][size=50pt]ANALYSIS[/size][/font][/center]

[color=darkcyan]Eluminous Is going to be my greatest project yet. I am going to be making this server pking. Even though it is PI and there are bugs everyone already knows bugs can be fixed and things can be improved Old and new Runescape will be combined in one game. I am going to make this an experience of a lifetime and host this server as long as i can. Me and my soon to be partner will be discussing multiple things we are adding from this server but we wont be able to do this alone. We are going to need your support as well and we are going to need some good ideas to help us make this server what i am hopping it can become. If u want to support this project please take the provided image below and stick it in your signature to show you want Eluminous to go big!.
